<xen:title>{xen:phrase ban_client}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'torrents/client-ban'}">{xen:phrase client_ban_manager}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'torrents/client-ban/add'}" class="formOverlay">
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase peer_id}:" hint="{xen:phrase required}" name="peer_id" inputclass="autoSize" maxlength="20"> <xen:explain> {xen:phrase peer_id_desc} </xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase comment}:" name="comment" maxlength="200" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase save}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase client_ban_manager} + {xen:phrase ban_client}
{xen:phrase banned_clients}
{xen:phrase peer_id} {xen:phrase comment}
{$client.peer_id} {$client.comment} {xen:phrase delete}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase ban_ip}s</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'torrents/ip-ban'}">{xen:phrase ip_ban_manager}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'torrents/ip-ban/add'}" class="formOverlay">
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase begin}:" hint="{xen:phrase required}" name="begin" inputclass="autoSize" value=""> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase example}: 10.0.0.0</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase end}:" hint="{xen:phrase required}" name="end" inputclass="autoSize"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase example}: 10.255.255.255</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase comment}:" name="comment" maxlength="200" > <xen:explain>{xen:phrase dont_allow_private_networks} - 10.0.0.0/8</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase save}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase ip_ban_manager} + {xen:phrase ban_ips}
{xen:phrase banned_ips}
{xen:phrase id} {xen:phrase comment} {xen:phrase begin} {xen:phrase end}
{$id} {$ip.comment} {xen:helper long2ip, $ip.begin} {xen:helper long2ip, $ip.end} {xen:phrase delete}

phrases.phrase: The points are then removed from your Bonus Bank and the credit is added to your total uploaded amount.
Exchange your Bonus Points for upload credits!
If not specified, user can't leech (download the files inside the torrent).
Failed to reset your passkey. Please try again or contact the site owner.
Following values will be set for the user while upgrade is active
For every hour that you seed a torrent, you are awarded with 1 Bonus Point.
Only uploading is taken into account, and the downloading is totally ignored.
List of users that have reported a snatch to the tracker.
Minimum post required to download this torrent is {post}.
Minimum ratio required to download torrent is {ratio}
Only one torrent allowed per thread
Free leech means that what users download will not be counted.
User with posts less than specified value will not be allowed to download torrent.
User with ratio less than specified value will not be allowed to download new torrents. Set 0 to disable ratio system.

The purpose of the private flag is to prevent torrents from being shared with clients that do not have access to the tracker. If you turn off this option, then your torrent tracker will be a public tracker.
Number of seconds after which user can ask for reseed
These details will be used to connect to your XBT Tracker for update and will also be used as announce URL.
This controls the maximum number of torrents that will be shown on one page.
if specified, displays tracker stats on forum index.
The maximum permitted simultaneous connections per torrent. The default is 0 (unlimited)

Clients with peer_id starting with this are banned from using tracker.
You can check for a more detailed description of the clients in this link
View peer list of a torrent
View snatch list of a torrent
The requested torrent could not be found.
A request will be send to staff members for making this torrent a freeleech torrent.

Every time that you reset your passkey, you must re-download every single torrent that you are downloading or seeding at the same time Or else the tracker will respond to you with a `Unregistered Torrent Pass` error.
Select the category that best describes your torrent.
Color for ratio greater or equal to 1.
Display the message poster's torrent tracker stats, if specified.
There are no active requests requiring your attention.
There are no torrents to display.
There was already a re-seed request for this torrent within the last 24hrs.
This torrent is already uploaded before
Torrents are being shown from all child categories.
Torrent upload is allowed only on first post of the thread.
Torrents are not allowed in this forum
Torrent tracker host is not set
Torrent tracker port is not set
User has downloaded at least X megabytes (MB)
User has uploaded at least X megabytes (MB)
Use this as Announce URL for your torrent
The time the user must wait between the date of the torrent and the download. Value in seconds. The default is 0
Update user information in the tracker
{user} has requested a re-seed for the torrent {title} which you completed on {date}.
{user} has requested a re-seed for the torrent {title} which you uploaded on {date}.
You don't have enough bonus points for this trade.
You have already sent maximum number of reseed requests for the day.
You must like the thread before you can download this torrent.
You must reply before you can download this torrent.

property.description: Color for ratio greater or equal to 1.
